com.qualcomm.robotcore.util

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Device

  • public final class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    A few constants that help us detect which device we are running on

        public static java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
                                        throws AndroidSerialNumberNotFoundException
        Get the Android device's serial number, as defined by Build.SERIAL Uses a fallback method if that API fails
        Throws:
        AndroidSerialNumberNotFoundException - if the serial number could not be determined

      • getSerialNumberOrUnknown

        public static java.lang.String getSerialNumberOrUnknown()
